sen.j: 四代目 中村 雀右衛門（よだいめ なかむら じゃくえもん、大正9年(1920年)8月20日 -）は、俳優、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Jakuemon NAKAMURA the fourth (August 20, 1920 -) is an actor and Kabuki actor.
Jakuemon NAKAMURA the Fourth (August 20, 1920 -) is an actor and Kabuki actor.
Jakuemon NAKAMURA the Fourth (August 20, 1920 -) is an actor and Kabuki actor.
His trade name is Kyoya.
sen.cmt: 「屋号」用語集に複数登録が有ります（他にstage family name, yago (the name of the store)
sen.e: His stage name is Kyoya.
His stage name is Kyoya.

sen.j: 定紋は京屋結び、替紋は向い雀。
sen.e: His Jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi and his Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Mukai Suzume.
sen.cmt: 用語集を参照の上、表記を統一しています（ハイフネーション、キャピタル）
sen.e: His Jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi and his Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Mukai Suzume.
His Jomon (family crest) is Kyoya Musubi and his Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Mukai Suzume.

sen.j: 本名は青木 清治（あおき きよはる）。
sen.e: His real name is Kiyoharu AOKI.
His real name is Kiyoharu AOKI.
His real name is Kiyoharu AOKI.

sen.j: 青年時代は七代目大谷友右衛門として、多数の映画に出演し人気を博した。
sen.e: As a youth, he appeared in many movies under the name of Tomoemon OTANI the seventh and became quite popular.
As a youth, he appeared in many movies under the name of Tomoemon OTANI the Seventh and became quite popular.
As a youth, he appeared in many movies under the name of Tomoemon OTANI the Seventh and became quite popular.

sen.j: 現在の歌舞伎における女形の大御所（立役）。
sen.e: He is an influential figure as an actor of female roles in today's Kabuki world.
sen.cmt: 立役＝男役ですので原文にミスの可能性があります。中村は30代に立役から女形に変わったので説明が必要と思われます。
sen.e: He is an influential figure as an actor of female roles in today's Kabuki world.
He is an influential figure as an actor of female roles in today's Kabuki world.

sen.j: 若々しい美しさと、格調の高さ、芸格の大きさで人気が高い。
sen.e: He is very popular for his youthful beauty, elegance and prestigious performance.
He is very popular for his youthful beauty, elegance and prestigious performance.
He is very popular for his youthful beauty, elegance and prestigious performance.

sen.j: 息子二人も歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Both of his sons are also Kabuki actors.
Both of his sons are also Kabuki actors.
Both of his sons are also Kabuki actors.

sen.j: 長男は明石屋を継承し、主に立役を勤める大谷友右衛門 (8代目)。
sen.e: His older son, Tomoemon OTANI the eighth, took over the trade name "Akashiya" and performs mainly as tachiyaku (a leading male-role actor.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His older son, Tomoemon OTANI the Eighth, took over the trade name "Akashiya" and performs mainly as tachiyaku (a leading male-role actor).
sen.cmt: the Eighthとし、ピリオドの位置を移動
sen.e: His older son, Tomoemon OTANI the Eighth, took over the trade name "Akashiya" and performs mainly as tachiyaku (a leading male-role actor).

sen.j: 次男は女形で雀右衛門の芸の後継者である中村芝雀 (7代目)である。
sen.e: His younger son, Shibajaku NAKAMURA the seventh, is the successor to Jakuemon's performance as an actor of female roles.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His younger son, Shibajaku NAKAMURA the Seventh, is the successor to Jakuemon's performance as an actor of female roles.
His younger son, Shibajaku NAKAMURA the Seventh, is the successor to Jakuemon's performance as an actor of female roles.

sen.j: CS放送「歌舞伎チャンネル」を運営する伝統文化放送では、歌舞伎役者で唯一取締役に就任している。
sen.e: He is an only Kabuki actor appointed as a board member of Traditional Culture Broadcasting that manages "Kabuki Channel" of CS broadcasting.
sen.cmt: 伝統文化放送は既に解散しているようです
sen.e: He is an only Kabuki actor appointed as a board member of Traditional Culture Broadcasting that manages 'Kabuki Channel' of CS broadcasting.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: He is an only Kabuki actor appointed as a board member of Traditional Culture Broadcasting that manages 'Kabuki Channel' of CS broadcasting.

tit.e: Chronological list of the main events
Chronological list of the main events
Chronological list of the main events

sen.e: August 20, 1920
August 20, 1920:
sen.cmt: スペース削除、コロン追加
sen.e: August 20, 1920:

sen.j: - 大谷友右衛門 (6代目)の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: - He was born as the eldest son of Tomoemon OTANI the sixth.
He was born as the eldest son of Tomoemon OTANI the Sixth.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除、the Sixthとしました。
sen.e: He was born as the eldest son of Tomoemon OTANI the Sixth.
January 1927
January 1927:
sen.cmt: スペース削除、コロン追加
sen.e: January 1927:

sen.j: - 市村座にて『幼字劇書初』の桜丸で大谷廣太郎を名のり初舞台。
sen.e: - He made a debut under the name of Hirotaro OTANI, playing the role of Sakuramaru in "Osanamoji Kabuki no Kakizome" at the Ichimura-za Theater.
He made a debut under the name of Hirotaro OTANI, playing the role of Sakuramaru in "Osanamoji Kabuki no Kakizome" at the Ichimura-za Theater.
He made a debut under the name of Hirotaro OTANI, playing the role of Sakuramaru in "Osanamoji Kabuki no Kakizome" at the Ichimura-za Theater.
- He went to the front.
He went to the front.
He went to the front.
- He was discharged.
He was discharged.
He was discharged.
June 1947
June 1947:
sen.cmt: スペース削除、コロン追加
sen.e: June 1947:

sen.j: - 三越劇場にて『源平布引滝』の小万,『御所五郎蔵』の逢州で女形として舞台に復帰。
sen.e: - He came back to the stage as an actor of female roles, by playing the roles of Koman in "Genpei Nunobiki no Taki" and Osyu in "GOSHO no Gorozo" at the Mitsukoshi Theater.
He came back to the stage as an actor of female roles, by playing the roles of Koman in "Genpei Nunobiki no Taki" and Oshu in "Gosho no Gorozo" at the Mitsukoshi Theater.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除、Osyu→Oshuに修正、"Gosho no Gorozo"に修正
sen.e: He came back to the stage as an actor of female roles, by playing the roles of Koman in "Genpei Nunobiki no Taki" and Oshu in "Gosho no Gorozo" at the Mitsukoshi Theater.
March 1948
March 1948:
sen.cmt: スペース削除、コロン追加
sen.e: March 1948:

sen.j: - 東京劇場にて『扇屋熊谷』の平敦盛ほかで七代目大谷友右衛門を襲名。
sen.e: - He succeeded to the name, Tomoemon OTANI (the seventh) by playing the roles such as TAIRA no Atsumori in "Ogiya Kumagai " at the Tokyo Theatre.
sen.cmt: 用語集ではTokyo-gekijo Theaterでしたが他劇場名と統一しました
sen.e: He succeeded to the name, Tomoemon OTANI (the Seventh) by playing the roles such as TAIRA no Atsumori in "Ogiya Kumagai " at the Tokyo Theatre.
sen.cmt: 全角スペースを半角に修正、the Seventhとし、ハイフン消去
sen.e: He succeeded to the name, Tomoemon OTANI (the Seventh) by playing the roles such as TAIRA no Atsumori in "Ogiya Kumagai " at the Tokyo Theatre.

sen.j: - 『佐々木小次郎』で映画デビュー。
sen.e: - He made his film debut in "Kojiro SASAKI."
He made his film debut in "Kojiro SASAKI."
He made his film debut in "Kojiro SASAKI."

sen.j: - 関西に活動の場を移す。
sen.e: - He moved his center place for work, from Tokyo to Kansai area.
He moved his center place for work, from Tokyo to Kansai area.
He moved his center place for work, from Tokyo to Kansai area.
September 1964
September 1964:
sen.cmt: スペース消去、コロン追加
sen.e: September 1964:

sen.j: - 歌舞伎座にて『金閣寺』の雪姫ほかで四代目中村雀右衛門を襲名。
sen.e: - He succeeded to the name, Jakuemon NAKAMURA (the fourth) by playing the roles such as Yukihime in "Kinkaku-ji Temple" at the Kabuki-za Theater.
He succeeded to the name, Jakuemon NAKAMURA (the Fourth) by playing the roles such as Yukihime in "Kinkaku-ji Temple" at the Kabuki-za Theater.
sen.cmt: ハイフン消去、the Fourthとしました。
sen.e: He succeeded to the name, Jakuemon NAKAMURA (the Fourth) by playing the roles such as Yukihime in "Kinkaku-ji Temple" at the Kabuki-za Theater.

sen.j: - 重要無形文化財保持者（人間国宝）に認定。
sen.e: - He was accredited as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure.)
He was accredited as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
sen.cmt: ハイフン消去、ピリオドの位置を移動
sen.e: He was accredited as the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
- He became a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He became a member of the Japan Art Academy.
He became a member of the Japan Art Academy.

sen.j: - 日本俳優協会副会長に就任。
sen.e: - He assumed the post of vice president at Japan Actor's Association.
He assumed the post of vice president at Japan Actor's Association.
He assumed the post of vice president at Japan Actor's Association.

sen.j: - 伝統歌舞伎保存会会長に就任。
sen.e: - He assumed the post of president at the Organization for the Preservation of Kabuki.
He assumed the post of president at the Organization for the Preservation of Kabuki.
He assumed the post of president at the Organization for the Preservation of Kabuki.

sen.j: - 日本俳優協会会長に就任。
sen.e: - He became the president of Japan Actor's Association.
He became the president of Japan Actor's Association.
He became the president of Japan Actor's Association.
(until 2008)
(until 2008)
(until 2008)
- He was presented with the Order of Culture.
He was presented with the Order of Culture.
He was presented with the Order of Culture.
- He received the Award of the Japan Art Academy.
sen.cmt: 以下全てセンテンスにしています
sen.e: He received the Award of the Japan Art Academy.
He received the Award of the Japan Art Academy.
- He received the Medal of Honor with Purple Ribbon.
- He received the Medal of Honor with Purple Ribbon.
- He received the Medal of Honor with Purple Ribbon.
- He received the grand prize of Mayama Seika Award.

sen.j: - 伝統文化ポーラ大賞、勲四等旭日小綬章。
sen.e: - He received Pola Grand Prize for Traditional Culture, and the Order of the Rising Sun, Gold Rays with Rosette.
He received Pola Grand Prize for Traditional Culture, and the Order of the Rising Sun, Gold Rays with Rosette.
He received Pola Grand Prize for Traditional Culture, and the Order of the Rising Sun, Gold Rays with Rosette.

He received the Order of the Sacred Treasure, Gold Rays with Neck Ribbon.
